Text: The Parker–Hulme murder case began in the city of Christchurch, New Zealand, on 22 June 1954, when Honora Rieper (also known as Honora Parker, her legal name) was killed by her teenaged daughter, Pauline Parker, and Pauline's close friend Juliet Hulme (later known as Anne Perry).
